title: The Big roar

Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Life change events
abstract: 'My two brothers and sister were crying and my mum was saying, "It's ok, stop crying".'
description: Daniel Young didn't feel safe the night before the tornado roared through his house. After it had passed, Young's family were safe but it had left a great wave of destruction in its path.  On the 3rd of June 2010, the residents of Lennox Head, on the North Coast of New South Wales, were preparing for the day ahead when their town was struck by a tornado.
